title: You have exceeded the maximum number of code redemption attempts at this time.
body: So I went to the store and got a card for RP and it turned out the stupid cashier didn't actually scan it, so it wasn't activated. I went to get another and now it gives me this message "You have exceeded the maximum number of code redemption attempts at this time. Please wait and try again later." **PLEASE** don't tell me I have to wait a full day. {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

did you ever get that RP card redeemed?
